display_help: This desperation move fire all weapons on full automatic -- the plasma guns hitting nearby targets, the missile pods firing on those further out, the railguns on distant targets, with a little overlap between each system. It is designed to flatten the area, and is quite effective.
display_short_help: PBAoE, High DMG(Energy/Fire), DoT(Energy), Foe -Regen, Knockback - and/or - High DMG(Lethal/Fire), DoT(Toxic), Knockdown - and/or - High DMG(Energy/Lethal), Foe - RES, Knockback
display_target_help: This desperation move fire all weapons on full automatic -- the plasma guns hitting nearby targets, the missile pods firing on those further out, the railguns on distant targets, with a little overlap between each system. It is designed to flatten the area, and is quite effective.
display_target_short_help: PBAoE, High DMG(Energy/Fire), DoT(Energy), Foe -Regen, Knockback - and/or - High DMG(Lethal/Fire), DoT(Toxic), Knockdown - and/or - High DMG(Energy/Lethal), Foe - RES, Knockback
